name: Terraformars: SHOOTING STAR - On Track and Reckless
short_description: During a precarious clash atop a terraformar's web, Captain Komachi is haunted by a soul from the past and is ready to put the grim incident from the Bugs 2 project behind him. Meanwhile, deep within the pyramid, Squad 3 makes an unexpected discovery of an inexplicable object from decades past.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
